name: Date Picker for Gravity Forms
author: Gravity Master

sections.description:
Date Picker for Gravity Forms is a simple yet powerful add-on that allows you to add a date picker field to your Gravity Forms. Enhance your forms with a user-friendly date selection tool, making it easier for users to select dates without manual entry errors.

Features

  • Easy Integration: Seamlessly add date picker fields to any Gravity Form with just a few clicks.
  • Customizable: Customize the date format, restrict date ranges, disable specific dates, and more.
  • Responsive Design: The date picker is fully responsive and works on all devices.
  • Localization Support: Supports multiple languages and date formats, making it suitable for international audiences.
  • Accessibility: Built with accessibility in mind to ensure that everyone can use your forms with ease.
  • Theme Compatibility: Works smoothly with any WordPress theme that supports Gravity Forms.

Why use a Date Picker for Gravity Forms?

Using a Date Picker for Gravity Forms simplifies date selection for users, enhances form usability, and ensures consistent date formatting, reducing errors and improving data accuracy. By adding a date picker, you streamline the form-filling process, making it more efficient and user-friendly.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/date-picker-for-gravity-forms directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to your Gravity Forms and add a Date Picker field to your form.
sections.faq:
Can I restrict date selection to weekdays only?

Yes, you can easily restrict the selectable dates to weekdays or any specific days using the plugin settings.

Does the plugin support time selection?

Currently, the plugin focuses on date selection. Time selection features are planned for future updates.

Is the date picker field compatible with all browsers?

Yes, the date picker field is compatible with all major browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
